channel.title: Comments on: Cynicism vs. Idealism
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: George Dafermos
item.dc:creator: George Dafermos
item.description:
Right on!
The power of imagination far outstrips cynicism, and life is nothing but a constantly flowing set of opportunities waiting to be turned into substance.
great post!
item.content:encoded:
Right on!

The power of imagination far outstrips cynicism, and life is nothing but a constantly flowing set of opportunities waiting to be turned into substance.

great post!
